description: This accessory is compatible with:-iPhone 3G and iPod Touch 2G (you need to download software and install to your iPhone e.g. iTalk Recorder or Easy Recorder)-iPod Nano 4G and iPod Classic 120GB (you may use its pre-loaded software for recordings)Now you can take advantage of the call features on Skype and Fring while on iPod Touch 2G. Just plug in the microphone.
title: Menotek Mini iPod Microphone for iPhone G/iPod Touch 2G/iPod Nano 4G/iPod Classic 120GB - BLACK
